text:
February 27, 1957
Dr. Burton Paulu
K U 0 M, One Eddy Hall
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
Further on NBC VP Heffeman.
Yes, I did check with Lenny before I talked
with Joe. He agreed on my position.
Also, followed up with note to Joe, and had
pleasurable reply from him expressing appreciation
for visit and viewpoint.
Sincerely,
Prank E. Schooley
FES:nb
